text: EU backs Somalia after Israel recognizes Somaliland - DW
fullText: Israel’s support for Somaliland has triggered sharp pushback across Africa, the Middle East and beyond, with the EU urging calm and Somalia vowing to defend its sovereignty.

text: Dark Energy may be changing and with it the fate of the Universe - BBC
fullText: A mysterious force called Dark Energy might be changing, in a way that challenges our current understanding of the nature of time and space.

text: Broncos clinch 2025 AFC West division title - Denver Broncos
fullText: Denver is back atop the AFC West, as the Broncos clinched their 16th AFC West division title in franchise history and their first since 2015.

text: Jeffrey R. Holland, next in line to lead Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, dies at 85 - NPR
fullText: Jeffrey R. Holland led the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, a key governing body. He was next in line to become the church's president.

text: Winter storm brings heavy snow and ice to busy holiday travel weekend - NPR
fullText: A powerful winter storm is impacting parts of the U.S. with major snowfall, ice, and below zero wind chills. The conditions are disrupting holiday travel and could last through next week.

text: War-torn Myanmar votes in widely criticised 'sham' election - BBC
fullText: Observers say the vote, accompanied by a renewed crackdown on dissent, is meant to entrench the junta's power.

text: UK restricts DR Congo visas over migrant return policy - BBC
fullText: The Home Office says Kinshasa has failed to agree to measures allowing the return of illegal immigrants and foreign national offenders.
